argument.name: session_handle
argument.description: Optional. Default = Session for the current form or browse window. Numeric

page.description: Reports if editing is allowed for a particular session (the current session if ommited).
page.discussion: ALLOW_EDITING() returns the current setting of the Form > Allow Edits, or Browse > Allow Edits menu command. If this menu choice is checked (edits allowed), the Result_Flag is .T. . If it is cleared, Result_Flag is .F. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
